snippet.title: The Commonwealth Economy: How Big Blue Nation spends its green
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Reign of terror: Shawn Kemp, Gary Payton and the rise of the Seattle Supersonics
snippet.description:
Reign of terror: Shawn Kemp, Gary Payton and the rise of the Seattle Supersonics by Paul Flannery on Mar 25 2014, 9:39a
They won zero titles, but led by Shawn Kemp, Gary Payton and George Karl, the Seattle Supersonics emerged as one of the most compelling, eclectic and memorable non-champions in NBA history.
